lead_paragraph: Katherine Connors, a beauty queen, threw out the first pitch in Washington because Nationals pitcher Miguel Batista had made a joke about Miss Iowa.
snippet: Katherine Connors, a beauty queen, threw out the first pitch in Washington because Nationals pitcher Miguel Batista had made a joke about Miss Iowa.

headline.main: Strasburg’s Replacement Catches Miss Iowa’s Pitch
headline.seo: Miss Iowa Makes Debut as a Pitcher
